titleInfo.title: Roster in the Round at Cowboys LaCage

mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and pink - purple on white) announcing the Rooster in the Round, CRS 1970, Back in the Beginning, presented by Epic Nashville, at Cowboys LaCage on February 28. Poster features metal photoplates of Joe Diffie, Collin Raye, Ken Mellons, Stephanie Bentley, James Bonamy, Ty Herndon, and James House.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
